page:
OpenMath Thematic Network Kick-off Meeting
Berlin 6-7 August 2001
Some notes of the technical part of the meeting can be found here (PDF).
The following presentations were given:
Electronic Books/Algebra Interactive! (HTML) Arjeh Cohen, Technical University of Eindhoven
Some Thoughts on Sorted Generalized Quantifiers in OpenMath (HTML) Andreas Strottman, Florida State University
Recent Developments in MathML and W3C (HTML) David Carlisle, NAG Ltd
Current and Future CD Development (PDF) James Davenport, University of Bath
An OpenMath Schema (PDF) Olga Caprotti, RISC Linz
Online Mathematical Services (HTML) Mike Dewar, NAG Ltd.
